other_tests.findings: After the second treatment, the patient was found to have bilateral weakness of facial muscles and complete flaccid paralysis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Following the fourth treatment, she developed auditory hallucinations and further deterioration in her condition leading to death.

other_tests.findings: The examination revealed myocardial atrophy and scarring, mild subsiding hepatitis, chronic pyelitis, passive congestion of viscera, cholecystectomy, and moderate generalized obesity.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The brain appeared anemic, with changes including fatty products in nerve cells, cellular changes in the frontal cortex, scattered areas of disruption, and several necrotic areas.
